languages.text: "Наследные принцы пьют с преступниками, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} ведут дела с {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбалликой{/g}, а десятки кораблей останавливаются на отдых после долгого плавания — разве есть во всем Империуме место прекрасней? Император милостив ко всем, и к ничтожным, и к благим. Здесь для каждого найдется работенка, коль голова на плечах. А захочешь поговорить с Самим — статую Великого с любого астероида видно, молись на здоровье".

traits.locale_text: "Наследные принцы пьют с преступниками, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} ведут дела с {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбалликой{/g}, а десятки кораблей останавливаются на отдых после долгого плавания — разве есть во всем Империуме место прекрасней? Император милостив ко всем, и к ничтожным, и к благим. Здесь для каждого найдется работенка, коль голова на плечах. А захочешь поговорить с Самим — статую Великого с любого астероида видно, молись на здоровье".

languages.text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."
languages.original_text: "Наследные принцы пьют с преступниками, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} ведут дела с {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбалликой{/g}, а десятки кораблей останавливаются на отдых после долгого плавания — разве есть во всем Империуме место прекрасней? Император милостив ко всем, и к ничтожным, и к благим. Здесь для каждого найдется работенка, коль голова на плечах. А захочешь поговорить с Самим — статую Великого с любого астероида видно, молись на здоровье".

traits.locale_text: "Dynasty heirs drink together with criminals, Rogue Traders strike deals with Kasballica, and dozens of ship stay for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Great One is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There is job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Great One can be seen from any asteroid, pray to your heart's content."

"Dynasty heirs drink together with criminals, Rogue Traders strike deals with Kasballica, and dozens of ship stay for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Great One is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There is job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Great One can be seen from any asteroid, pray to your heart's content."

"Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, Rogue Traders strike deals with the Kasballica, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Exalted One is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

"Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, Rogue Traders strike deals with the Kasballica, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Exalted One is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

"Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

"Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

languages.text: “王朝的继承人与罪犯一起喝酒，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}达成交易，几十艘舰船从漫长的航行停下来，来到这里休息。整个帝国还有比这里更美好的地方吗？帝皇对弱小与强大的人们都很仁慈。只要你的脑袋还在脖子上，就肯定能找到赖以为生的手段。如果你打算与帝皇私下谈谈的话，无论你在哪颗小行星上，都能看到至高无上的神皇雕像。你可以尽情祈祷，直到你心满意足为止。”
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: “王朝的继承人与罪犯一起喝酒，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}达成交易，几十艘舰船从漫长的航行停下来，来到这里休息。整个帝国还有比这里更美好的地方吗？帝皇对弱小与强大的人们都很仁慈。只要你的脑袋还在脖子上，就肯定能找到赖以为生的手段。如果你打算与帝皇私下谈谈的话，无论你在哪颗小行星上，都能看到至高无上的神皇雕像。你可以尽情祈祷，直到你心满意足为止。”

languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, Rogue Traders strike deals with the Kasballica, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

languages.text: «Los herederos de las dinastías beben con criminales, los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} hacen tratos con la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y veintenas de naves se detienen para un merecido descanso de un largo viaje... ¿Hay un lugar más maravilloso en todo el Imperium? El Emperador es piadoso con los humildes y los poderosos por igual. Hay un trabajo para todos, siempre que tengan dos dedos de frente. Y si quieres hablar con Él en persona, la estatua del Exaltado se ve desde todos los asteroides, así que puedes rezar alegremente».
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: «Los herederos de las dinastías beben con criminales, los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} hacen tratos con la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y veintenas de naves se detienen para un merecido descanso de un largo viaje... ¿Hay un lugar más maravilloso en todo el Imperium? El Emperador es piadoso con los humildes y los poderosos por igual. Hay un trabajo para todos, siempre que tengan dos dedos de frente. Y si quieres hablar con Él en persona, la estatua del Exaltado se ve desde todos los asteroides, así que puedes rezar alegremente».

languages.text: 「王朝の後継者たちは犯罪者たちと酒を酌み交わし、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と取引し、何十隻もの船が長い航海の疲れを癒すために立ち寄る…帝国の中で、これほど美しい場所があるだろうか？皇帝は弱者にも強者にも慈悲深い。頭がくっついてさえいれば、誰にでも仕事はある。皇帝と直接話したくなったら、どの小惑星からもエグザルテッド・ワンの像が見える。…心ゆくまで祈りを捧げられるってわけさ」
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: 「王朝の後継者たちは犯罪者たちと酒を酌み交わし、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と取引し、何十隻もの船が長い航海の疲れを癒すために立ち寄る…帝国の中で、これほど美しい場所があるだろうか？皇帝は弱者にも強者にも慈悲深い。頭がくっついてさえいれば、誰にでも仕事はある。皇帝と直接話したくなったら、どの小惑星からもエグザルテッド・ワンの像が見える。…心ゆくまで祈りを捧げられるってわけさ」

languages.text: "Erben großer Dynastien trinken mit Verbrechern, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} machen Geschäfte mit der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und dutzende von Schiffen machen auf langen Reisen kurz Rast — gibt es im gesamten Imperium einen schöneren Ort? Der Imperator ist mit den Schwachen ebenso gnädig wie mit den Mächtigen. Es gibt für jeden Arbeit, der nicht ganz dumm im Kopf ist. Und wenn einem danach ist, persönlich mit ihm zu sprechen: Die Statue des Erhabenen ist von jedem Asteroiden aus zu sehen, man kann nach Herzenslust beten."
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: "Erben großer Dynastien trinken mit Verbrechern, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} machen Geschäfte mit der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und dutzende von Schiffen machen auf langen Reisen kurz Rast — gibt es im gesamten Imperium einen schöneren Ort? Der Imperator ist mit den Schwachen ebenso gnädig wie mit den Mächtigen. Es gibt für jeden Arbeit, der nicht ganz dumm im Kopf ist. Und wenn einem danach ist, persönlich mit ihm zu sprechen: Die Statue des Erhabenen ist von jedem Asteroiden aus zu sehen, man kann nach Herzenslust beten."

languages.text: « Des héritiers de dynasties trinquent avec des criminels, des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres marchands{/g} négocient avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et des dizaines de vaisseaux y font halte au cours de leurs longs voyages. Connaissez-vous un plus bel endroit dans tout l'Imperium ? L'Empereur accorde sa clémence aussi bien aux faibles qu'aux puissants. N'importe qui peut y trouver un travail, à la seule condition d'avoir la tête sur les épaules. Et si vous avez envie de dire quelques mots à l'Exalté, sa statue est visible depuis n'importe quel astéroïde, ce qui vous permet de prier tout votre saoul. »
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: « Des héritiers de dynasties trinquent avec des criminels, des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres marchands{/g} négocient avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et des dizaines de vaisseaux y font halte au cours de leurs longs voyages. Connaissez-vous un plus bel endroit dans tout l'Imperium ? L'Empereur accorde sa clémence aussi bien aux faibles qu'aux puissants. N'importe qui peut y trouver un travail, à la seule condition d'avoir la tête sur les épaules. Et si vous avez envie de dire quelques mots à l'Exalté, sa statue est visible depuis n'importe quel astéroïde, ce qui vous permet de prier tout votre saoul. »

languages.text: "Hanedanlık vârisleri, suçlularla içki içer; {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'yla{/g} anlaşmalar yapar; onlarca gemi de uzun yolculuklarına orada mola verip rahat birer nefes alır. Koca İmparatorluk'ta daha güzel bir yer olabilir mi? İmparator, mütevazılara da güçlülere de merhamet gösterir. Omuzları üzerinde kelle olan herkese uygun bir iş vardır. O'nunla bizzat konuşmak istersen de Görkemli'nin heykeli, bütün asteroitlerden görülebilir. Gönlünce dua edebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Dynasty heirs drink with criminals, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} strike deals with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, and dozens of ships stop off for a welcome break from a long voyage — is there a more beautiful place in the entire Imperium? The Emperor is merciful to the meek and the powerful alike. There's a job for everyone as long as they have a head on their shoulders. And if you feel like talking to Him in person, the statue of the Exalted One can be seen from any asteroid — you can pray to your heart's content."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlık vârisleri suçlularla içki içer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}ler {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'yla anlaşmalar yapar ve onlarca gemi uzun yolculuklarına orada mola verip rahat bir nefes alır. Koca İmparatorluk'ta daha güzel bir yer olabilir mi? İmparator mütevazı olanlara da güçlü olanlara da merhamet gösterir. Omuzlarının üzerinde bir kelle olan herkes için bir iş vardır. O'nunla bizzat konuşmak istersen de Görkemli'nin heykeli bütün asteroitlerden görülebilir. Gönlünce dua edebilirsin."
